numeric.errMessage: Incorrect numeric format. Must be number for integer or dot separated for double

objectId.errMessage: Incorrect format of ObjectId. It must consist of both digits and letters. Total length must be 24.

collectionName.errMessage: Table name must be between 3 and 255 characters long. (A-Z,a-z,0-9,_,-,.)
